p: In Justice Court Before Henry C Hale Justice of the Peace Territory of Washington County of King
To the Sheriff or any Constable of said County Greeting

Whereas Lui a Chinaman of Port Madison has been brought this day before the one of the Justice of the Peace in and for said County charged with on the oath of Thomas Beaton with having on the 16th day of November 1884 in said County committed the offense and crime of smoking and inhaling opium and in the progress of the of said charge it appear ing to the said magistrate that the said Liu has been guilty of the offense of smoking and inhaling opium committed at the time and place aforesaid and wheras the said Lui has failed to give bail in the sum of dollars for his

Therefore you the said deputy Sheriff in the name of the United States forthwith to convey and deliver the said Lui to the said keeper and you the said Keeper are hereby commanded to (new page) receive the said Lui into your custody in said Jail and him there safely keep for the of sixteen days. County or until he shall be dis charged by due course of law. Dated this 17th day of November 1884
Henry C Hale Justice of the Peace Pc Madison Precinct Kitsap County WT
